description: Make the most of seasonal mangoes with these dehydrated mango chips. Season them with cayenne pepper or dip them in chocolate for a moreish afternoon snack.
keywords: Finger food,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2021,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Dehydrated Mango Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Calypso mangoes, peeled, cut into 5mm-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 90°C/70°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.

HowToTip.tipText: Mango lamington chips: Dip one end of the dehydrated mango in 200g melted dark chocolate and 1/2 cup shredded coconut. Set aside for 5 minutes. Serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange mango, in a single layer, on trays. Bake for 6 hours or until dry and crisp. See tips.
